citations.title: Multi-FR: A Multi-objective Optimization Framework for Multi-stakeholder Fairness-aware Recommendation
Path-Specific Counterfactual Fairness for Recommender Systems
MARS-Gym: A Gym framework to model, train, and evaluate Recommender Systems for Marketplaces
Seller-side Outcome Fairness in Online Marketplaces
Counterfactual Explanation for Fairness in Recommendation
Multi-stakeholder Recommendation and its Connection to Multi-sided Fairness
Fairness of Exposure in Rankings (ResearchGate mirror)
Fairness of Exposure in Light of Incomplete Exposure Estimation
Fast online ranking with fairness of exposure

The response includes a detailed timeline with specific monthly milestones and durations (e.g., Month 1: Scoping and data readiness, Month 2: Exposure modeling and Experiment 1), and dependencies are implied through the sequential progression of experiments and prerequisites (e.g., baseline pipeline before experiments, causal fairness after multi-objective training). This meets the rubric criterion for sequencing with durations or dependencies.
